Topic.Title: Can someone please delete my textadventures.co.uk account?

Posts.EditableText: Hey. Could someone please delete my textadventures.co.uk account and all the games on it? I really don't like my account now, I just want to completely remove it and start fresh. It's called Drainos. If you could remove it it would be a great help. Thanks.
